statements: SELECT * FROM AssetUtilization
SELECT asset_name, utilization_rate FROM AssetUtilization
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, utilization_rate, last_utilization_date FROM AssetUtilization
SELECT * FROM AssetUtilization ORDER BY last_utilization_date DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM AssetUtilization WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8
SELECT * FROM AssetUtilization WHERE asset_id = 10 ORDER BY last_utilization_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_rate FROM AssetUtilization WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_rate, last_utilization_date FROM AssetUtilization WHERE last_utilization_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AssetUtilization WHERE last_utilization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY utilization_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(utilization_rate) AS average_utilization_rate FROM AssetUtilization;
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization_data;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_ratio FROM asset_utilization_data WHERE utilization_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT asset_id, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, allocated_amount FROM asset_utilization_data JOIN resource_allocation ON asset_utilization_data.asset_id = resource_allocation.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization_data WHERE utilization_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT asset_name, utilization_ratio FROM asset_utilization_data ORDER BY utilization_ratio DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT asset_name, utilization_ratio, utilization_timestamp FROM asset_utilization_data WHERE utilization_ratio > 0.8 AND asset_name LIKE 'A%'

SELECT asset_name, allocation_date, allocated_amount FROM asset_utilization_data INNER JOIN resource_allocation ON asset_utilization_data.asset_id = resource_allocation.asset_id ORDER BY allocation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000

SELECT asset_name, allocation_date, allocated_amount FROM asset_utilization_data INNER JOIN resource_allocation ON asset_utilization_data.asset_id = resource_allocation.asset_id WHERE utilization_ratio < 0.5 ORDER BY allocation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM asset_data;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM asset_data WHERE utilization_percentage > 50;
SELECT asset_name, location, utilization_percentage FROM asset_data WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_data ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_data WHERE asset_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM asset_data;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, location FROM asset_data ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, location, utilization_percentage FROM asset_data WHERE utilization_percentage > 50;
SELECT A.asset_name, U.timestamp, U.utilization_value FROM asset_data A JOIN utilization_log U ON A.asset_id = U.asset_id;
SELECT RA.allocation_date, RA.allocated_quantity, A.asset_name FROM resource_allocation RA JOIN asset_data A ON RA.asset_id = A.asset_id ORDER BY RA.allocation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_data;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_data ORDER BY asset_type ASC;
SELECT asset_location, last_updated FROM asset_data WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT asset_id, utilization_percent, utilization_date FROM utilization_data WHERE utilization_percent > 80;
SELECT asset_id, allocation_date, allocated_quantity FROM allocation_data ORDER BY allocation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM asset_data ORDER BY asset_name DESC, last_updated ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_location FROM asset_data WHERE asset_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT a.asset_name, u.utilization_percent, u.utilization_date FROM asset_data a JOIN utilization_data u ON a.asset_id = u.asset_id WHERE u.utilization_percent > 80;
SELECT d.decision_id, d.asset_id, a.asset_name, d.decision_date FROM decision_making d INNER JOIN asset_data a ON d.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE d.asset_id = 2 OR d.asset_id = 4;

SELECT a.asset_name, al.allocation_date, al.allocated_quantity FROM asset_data a LEFT JOIN allocation_data al ON a.asset_id = al.asset_id WHERE al.allocated_quantity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY al.allocation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Asset;
SELECT * FROM Utilization WHERE utilization_rate > 0.5;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT DISTINCT decision_type FROM Decision;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resource, Allocation WHERE Resource.resource_id = Allocation.resource_id;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, location FROM Asset;
SELECT * FROM Utilization ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT utilization_id, start_time, end_time, utilization_rate FROM Utilization WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, location FROM Asset JOIN Utilization ON Asset.asset_id = Utilization.asset_id;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, decision_description FROM Resource JOIN Allocation ON Resource.resource_id = Allocation.resource_id JOIN Decision ON Allocation.utilization_id = Decision.decision_id;
